STATIC_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: Skeleton creatures you control and other Zombie creatures you control get +1/+1 and have deathtouch.
Le creature Scheletro che controlli e le altre creature Zombie che controlli prendono +1/+1 e hanno tocco letale.
Skelett-Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst, und andere Zombie-Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst, erhalten +1/+1 und Todesberührung.
Les créatures Squelette que vous contrôlez et les autres créatures Zombie que vous contrôlez gagnent +1/+1 et ont le contact mortel.
Las criaturas Esqueleto y las otras criaturas Zombie que controlas obtienen +1/+1 y tienen la habilidad de toque mortal.
あなたがコントロールするスケルトン・クリーチャーとあなたがコントロールする他のゾンビ・クリーチャーは、＋１/＋１の修整を受けるとともに接死を持つ。
Skeleton creatures you control and other Zombie creatures you control get +1/+1 and have deathtouch.
Существа-Скелеты под вашим контролем и другие существа-Зомби под вашим контролем получают +1/+1 и имеют Смертельное касание.
As criaturas do tipo Esqueleto e as outras criaturas do tipo Zumbi que você controla recebem +1/+1 e têm toque mortífero.
STATIC_ABILITY.FILTER: return CreaturesYouControlOfType( CREATURE_TYPE_SKELETON ) or OtherCreaturesInPlayYouControlOfType( CREATURE_TYPE_ZOMBIE )
STATIC_ABILITY.CONTINUOUS_ACTION: if FilteredCard() ~= nil then local characteristics = FilteredCard():GetCurrentCharacteristics() if characteristics ~= nil then characteristics:Power_Add( 1 ) characteristics:Toughness_Add( 1 ) end end
local filtered_obj = FilteredCard() if filtered_obj ~= nil then filtered_obj:GetCurrentCharacteristics():Characteristic_Set( CHARACTERISTIC_DEATHTOUCH, 1 ) end
